Revolutionizing Surveillance Operations with NMC Cloud Services

CLIENT: A National Security Agency in Southeast Asia

  • Industry: Public Safety and Surveillance
  • Objective: Enhance real-time monitoring, ensure scalable video storage, and deploy AI-driven analytics for improved public safety.

Challenges

Inefficient Storage Management

The agency's traditional storage systems struggled to accommodate the massive influx of HD and 4K surveillance footage, leading to data loss and retrieval delays.

Limited Real-Time Monitoring Capabilities

Existing systems could not provide actionable insights or real-time alerts, slowing down incident response.

High Operational Costs

On-premises infrastructure required significant investments in hardware upgrades and maintenance, straining the agencys budget.

NMC Cloud Solution

Scalable Video Storage

  • Implemented a cloud-based object storage system capable of handling HD and 4K video streams from thousands of cameras.
  • Enabled long-term archiving with automated data lifecycle management to ensure compliance with regulations

Real-Time Analytics and AI Integration

  • Deployed AI-driven analytics for anomaly detection, facial recognition, and object tracking.
  • Introduced heat maps for crowd monitoring and optimizing traffic flow in public spaces.
  • Enabled real-time alerts to enhance situational awareness and accelerate response times.

Edge Computing for Latency Reduction

  • Integrated edge computing nodes to process video data closer to the source, reducing latency for critical applications like perimeter security.

RESULTS: Achieved

Enhanced Storage Efficiency
  • Reduced storage costs by 40% with a pay-as-you-go model and optimized data management.
  • Achieved 99.99% data availability, eliminating risks of footage loss.
Improved Public Safety and Response Times
  • Real-time alerts enabled security teams to address incidents 60% faster.
  • AI-driven analytics provided actionable insights, improving overall surveillance effectiveness.
Seamless Scalability

The cloud infrastructure accommodated a 50% increase in video data volumes without impacting performance.

Unified Operations

Centralized monitoring across multiple regions streamlined operations and improved coordination among security teams.

Strengthened Security

Zero incidents of data breaches or compliance violations post-implementation.

Why Choose NMC Cloud for Surveillance?

  • Tailored Solutions: Purpose-built for the surveillance industry, addressing storage, analytics, and integration challenges.
  • Scalability: Elastic infrastructure handles growing video data demands effortlessly.
  • Enhanced Security: State-of-the-art security measures ensure data protection and compliance.
  • Cutting-Edge Technology: AI, IoT, and edge computing integration for next-level monitoring capabilities.
  • Proven Reliability: High availability and redundancy ensure uninterrupted operations.

Client : Testimonial

NMC Cloud Services has completely transformed how we manage our surveillance operations. From real-time monitoring to scalable storage and advanced analytics, their solutions have empowered us to enhance public safety effectively and affordably. Their expertise in integrating cutting-edge technologies like AI and IoT has been a game-changer.
Director of Surveillance OperationsNational Security Agency
